values:
FRIENDS ONLY!

Hello. Most likely you found me through someone's lj I've been stalking or through . If you're only here because of the graphics, please watch the community instead of friending my personal journal. :)
Hysteriagalore: Username born from an avid passion for pretty words and Muse (the band). Hysteria by Muse. I always have one major obsession at a time, rarely take myself seriously and I have an affinity for fictional angst. I like British spelling, the colour pink and self-deprecatory humour. I COMMENT, I comment a lot on people's entries. This may or may not be a good thing. 22 years old, I'm currently working on my thesis for my B.Sc. in immunology. I LOVE Great Britain, coffee and Doctor Who. I do not love portmanteau couple names. This is all very important. I enjoy my fair share of fandom crack and intelligent mocking, but I hate the misuse of the concept "Mary Sue". FILMS: Lost in Translation, The Royal Tenenbaums, Northanger Abbey (ITV), The Fifth Element, The Lion King. MUSIC: Muse, The Smiths, Kaiser Chiefs, Franz Ferdinand, Pulp. LITERATURE: The Historian, Elizabeth Kostova. Shogun, James Clavell. The Hollows, Kim Harrison. Weather Warden, Rachel Caine. jPod, Douglas Coupland. TELEVISION: Doctor Who, Buffy the Vampire Slayer (first fandom love ♥) Monty Python, Smallville, Big Bang Theory. SHIPS: Doctor/Rose (Nine, Ten & Ten2), Buffy/Angel, Fred/Wes, Lois/Clark, Liz/Max RANDOM OBSESSIONS: Coffee (I cannot stress this enough), Photoshop, Ten, Skirts and pretty dresses, Great Britain DISLIKES: People confusing then/than, your/you're and their/they're. Biting on nails. Having to explain sarcastic/satiric remarks. Bad characterization in fics. The unethical use of Muse in Twilulz. GTFO SMEYER. FADS: True Blood, LOL VAMPIRE VIKING LOL, High heels, Anonymous, Colourful clothes.

It has finally come, what you've been waiting for... the: If you were cut it's because: - You don't comment on my posts/ I don't comment on your posts. - Your journal seem dead. - We never clicked. - We grew apart and have nothing in common any more. - I don't read your posts/You don't read my posts. - It has come to my attention that you are actually a bear disguising as a human. ♥ If you're not cut but feel like it's the time we said goodbye, feel free to defriend me. ♥ If you were cut but want to stay pm me about it or something. I wish you all the best guys and no drama, Y/Y? In the meantime for those who stays, here's some random linkage to stuff: 1. Awkwardfamilyphotos - Exactly what it says on the tin. Some really good ones here. 2. Whythefuckdoyouhaveakid - Really, some people just screw themselves over. 3. Robot dinosaurs that shoot beams when they roar - Arcade game. It's robots and dinosaurs and LASER BEAMS. 4. Literal Music Videos - Essentially a retelling of the musicvideo to the original melody, my faves: White Wedding he actually sounds like Idol, We built this city (this one is just so cracktastically crappy/awesome), Total Eclipse of the Heart, I would do anything for love 5. There, I fixed it - Not everyone's McGyver y'know. 6. FAILblog- Yeah, nothing new but still love. 7. Explain this image - No really, explain this image.
